ResourceHeader.Description:
The synoptic observations at YNAO (Yunnan 
Astronomical Observatory, Kunming, China) are carried out in a solar 
tower which hosts a twin telescope. Both telescopes have 18 cm 
aperture and one of them is the full disk H-alpha telescope.
Filter bandpass is 0.05 nm and tunable filter range is +/-0.1 nm.
A 2K x 2K CCD camera is used
